All things Greg J. Wild, all the time.

Need someone who can help your users make the most of your tech product? I'm pretty good at that.

  • Technical support? Sure!
  • Technical writing? Yup.
  • Content & product strategy? Those too.
  • And, I'm not a bad programmer either.

I'm user focused, but data driven. I work well in cross-functional teams. I'm ideally placed to support users and speak truth to product.
